pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Satisficing 'Excel', 'HTML', 'LaTeX', and 'RTF' Tables using a Simple Formula // Create "good enough" tables with a single formula. 'tablespan' tables can be exported to 'Excel', 'HTML', 'LaTeX', and 'RTF' by leveraging the packages 'openxlsx' and 'gt'. See https://jhorzek.github.io/tablespan/ for an introduction.
